name: SECURITY MANUFACTURERS COALITION ("SMC")
description: The SMC focuses on policy issues affecting aviation and intermodal security.
sampleDescriptions: Homeland Security; aviation and intermodal security; restoration of Passenger Security Fee (H.R. 1171, S. 472); security screening equipment acquisition policies.
